When using the New Publication feature in 1.4 with the default publication as
the template, only half of the index tags are updated in lucene_index.xconf. 

Upon creating a new publication test, these two lines remain unchanged in the file:

 <index analyzer="stopword_en" directory="lenya/pubs/default/work/lucene/index/
trash/index" id="default-trash">

  <index analyzer="stopword_en" directory="lenya/pubs/default/work/lucene/index/
archive/index" id="default-archive">
